sfdc:query.query: dsql:SELECT AccountNumber, Description, Industry, Name, NumberOfEmployees FROM Account WHERE NumberOfEmployees > 5000 AND (Industry = 'Education' OR Industry = 'Government')
sfdc:query.doc:name: query Accounts from Salesforce instance A

sfdc:query-single.query: SELECT Id FROM Account WHERE Name = '#[payload['Name']]'
sfdc:query-single.doc:name: query Account in Salesforce instance B

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Transform Message for upsert
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- payload map { (Id: $.IdInB) when $.IdInB != null, AccountNumber: $.AccountNumber, Description: $.Description, Name: $.Name, Industry: $.Industry, (NumberOfEmployees: $.NumberOfEmployees as :number) when $.NumberOfEmployees != null }
